abstract: Updated, 6:59 p.m. | As the industry rushed to interpret the Directors Guild of America’s deal with the studios, the Writers Guild of America said it would carefully evaluate the terms of the agreement:
lead_paragraph: Updated, 6:59 p.m. | As the industry rushed to interpret the Directors Guild of America’s deal with the studios, the Writers Guild of America said it would carefully evaluate the terms of the agreement:

headline.main: Strike: Writers Looking At the Fine Print
